entry.title: Exquisite Distance
entry.summary:
Author: Lilviscious

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,719Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 818

Summary: The day Damian turned a legal age was one to never forget. His brothers would make certain of that. He had expected the family gathering, the dinner and the quality time his oldest brother wanted to spend with him. Damian had not expected to experience what Tim dubbed as a 'Robinrite' in the most indecent and suspicious nightclub Gotham had to offer.
